module.name: Enterprise Systems Development
module.description: This module focuses on N-tier architecture, Distributed Systems, Microservices, and Agile and Scrum methodologies. The module integrates a Live Brief, focusing on problem-based learning (PBL) and project-based learning (PjBL). Students will engage with real-world scenarios, collaborate in teams, and apply theoretical knowledge to practical problems, developing both technical and teamwork skills.

assessments.name: Timed Constrained Assessment (TCA)
details: The TCA assignment brief will be released under the 'TCA' section on Blackboard at 9am on Mon 4th November 2024.
The TCA will take place online during the week commencing Mon 4th November 2024.
You and your team will have 5 days (Mon to Fri) to prepare and record a team presentation.

steps: Log in to Blackboard using your student credentials.
Navigate to the Enterprise Systems Development (CO659WBL) module.
Locate the relevant assignment submission link for TCA or CW1.
Upload your completed assignment. Preferred format is PDF to ensure consistent formatting, though other formats like .docx may be accepted.
Once uploaded, click Submit to complete the submission process.
submissionGuidelines.important: Keep a copy of your submission confirmation/receipt as proof of submission. Always double-check the specific instructions provided by your tutor, which may be found in the module handbook or on Blackboard.
